Strategic Visionary

Co-Owner and Project Leader - Evaldas Stralkus

Meet Evaldas Stralkus, a visionary co-owner and project leader whosestrategic prowess fuels
the heart of our endeavors. With a rich backgroundas the former head of the Lithuanian Mint,
under his guidance, it evolved intoone of the finest mints globally. Evaldas is not only a
remarkable organizerand strategist but also an adept people manager, skilled negotiator, and
aseasoned numismatist.

Evaldas Stralkus

Transforming Visions into Reality

Evaldas Stralkus brings his exceptional expertise to ourcompany, shaping its direction with strategic finesse. Hisability to navigate complex negotiations, coupled with his deepunderstanding of numismatics, has propelled us to newheights. His leadership qualities have created a team thatexcels, ensuring that every project is not just completed, butperfected.

Driving Excellence

Leadership, Values, and Client Satisfaction

Evaldas Stralkus is an embodiment of leadership excellence, cultivated through a diverse professional journey. His track recordspans various business domains, consistently upholding the highest standards of values and ethics. He believes in one coreprinciple – to craft happiness for our clients. He understands that customer satisfaction cultivates brand loyalty and enhances ourcompany's image.

Evaldas's mastery in managing people, coupled with his keen insights into numismatics, brings a holistic approach to our projects.His leadership has not only led us to achieve remarkable feats but has also fostered an environment of continuous growth andinnovation.

As a co-owner and project leader, Evaldas Stralkus drives us to achieve greatness through his strategic acumen, dedication tovalues, and unwavering commitment to client happiness. His exceptional journey and accomplishments illuminate the path wefollow, reminding us that leadership isn't just about management – it's about creating happiness and leaving an indelible mark
